forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
A tranquil evening unfurls across Downtown San Francisco, with the night sky gradually revealing its stars against a canvas of fading warmth, settling around a gentle 56 degrees. A soft westerly breeze whispers through the streets, promising a spell of clarity in contrast to the usual dance of fog that sometimes cloaks the city. As dawn approaches, a delightful embrace of sunshine will break through, gliding toward a high near 66, giving way to a beautiful afternoon where temperatures gently settle around 64. 

Though the morning may bring the kind of brightness that invites a stroll, the cool breezes and hints of coastal chill will linger. Dress comfortably in layers; a light jacket over a cozy tee will suit your day beautifully as you meander through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods or perhaps lose yourself in the art charm of a local café. Whether you choose to wander the waterfront, enchant yourself with the historic streets, or simply contemplate life from a park bench, nature is calling softly, suggesting a delightful day ahead amid the welcoming arms of revealing skies and flourishing warmth.
